name: Nomination papers; when available
text: §12-2.5  Nomination papers; when available.  Nomination papers shall be made available from the first working day of February in every even-numbered year; provided that in the case of a special primary or special election, nomination papers shall be made available at least ten days prior to the close of filing. [L 1979, c 133, §7; am L 1990, c 35, §6]
